disthreadquestion.class.php

  • Global
  • Classes
    • \disThreadQuestion

package
discuss  

\disThreadQuestion
jump to top

The base class for Threads, which are compilations of Posts in a Board.

This class may be extended to provide derivative functionality.

Extends from
\disThread
package
discuss
